summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by changing the header logo Tailwind classes from 32x32 (h-8 w-8 per request context) to 64x64 (h-16 w-16) in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx. However, two additional files were modified that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (documentation/summary content) even though the request only called for adjusting the element sizing in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify applying the change ONLY to the selected header logo element and implementing it by adjusting Tailwind size classes in Header.tsx; no requirement mentioned updating summaries/docs.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json (project metadata/state tracking) even though the request only called for adjusting the element sizing in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asked for updating project tracking/state files; request scope was limited to the specific header logo sizing change.
